comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: 1943 news story that this photo seems to match: www.bethpagecommunity.com/community/woman_pilots Another photo of the same three women, in 1944: www.newsday.com/female-aviators-grumman-test-pilots-1.158... Cecil "Teddy" Kenyon (1905-1985): siris-archives.si.edu/ipac20/ipac.jsp?uri=full=3100001~!2...
